org.apache.pig.backend.hadoop.executionengine.tez.plan

Class TezOperPlan

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pig.impl.plan.OperatorPlan<TezOperator>
      • org.apache.pig.backend.hadoop.executionengine.tez.plan.TezOperPlan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<TezOperator>

    public class TezOperPlan
extends OperatorPlan<TezOperator>
    A Plan used to create the plan of Tez operators which can be converted into the Job Control object. This is necessary to capture the dependencies among jobs.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void remove(TezOperator op)
        Description copied from class: OperatorPlan
        Remove an operator from the plan. Any edges that the node has will be removed as well.
        Overrides:

      • disconnect

        public boolean disconnect(TezOperator from,
                 TezOperator to)
        Description copied from class: OperatorPlan
        Remove an edge from between two nodes. Use OperatorPlan.insertBetween(Operator, Operator, Operator) if disconnect is used in the process of inserting a new node between two nodes by calling disconnect followed by a connect.
        Overrides:
        disconnect in class OperatorPlan<TezOperator>
        Parameters:
        from - Operator data would flow from.
        to - Operator data would flow to.
        Returns:
        true if the nodes were connected according to the specified data flow, false otherwise.

      • moveTree

        public void moveTree(TezOperator root,
            TezOperPlan newPlan)
              throws PlanException
        Move everything below a given operator to the new operator plan. The specified operator will be moved and will be the root of the new operator plan
        Parameters:
        root - Operator to move everything under including the root operator
        newPlan - new operator plan to move things into
        Throws:
        PlanException
